title: What's Left for Apple in 2022? iPad, Mac, and Reality Rumors!
description: Yeah, yeah, new iPhone and whatever. What's next in Apple's release schedule for 2022? For 16 free meals with HelloFresh across 7 boxes AND 3 free gifts, use code SNAZZYLABS16 at   Follow Snazzy Labs on Twitter -  Follow me on Instagram -   Quinn talks about the rest of Apple's 2022 lineup and into 2023 because things may not be as they seem. Is there going to be an October event as per usual? Let's talk about the M2 Mac mini, M2 Max and M2 Ultra MacBook Pros, the new Mac Pro, a refreshed iPad and iPad Pro, potential new Apple TV hardware, HomePod refreshes, and maybe even the Apple Reality Pro headset!
